name: Kayros Exchange
description: The Kayros Exchange is a user-friendly and powerful application designed to help cryptocurrency investors efficiently manage their digital asset portfolios. Whether you're a seasoned trader or just starting in the world of cryptocurrencies, Kayros offers essential tools and features to keep you informed and in control of your investments.

name: Decentralise Impact
description: Decentralise Impact (D.I.) is a DAO designed to empower and nurture emerging startups within the blockchain ecosystem. Built on the principles of decentralization, D.I. operates as a community-driven platform that aims to revolutionize the way startups in the blockchain space receive support and resources.

name: Helium
description: Helium is a cutting-edge Software as a Service (SaaS) application designed to streamline and simplify the management of employee work hours. With a user-friendly interface and robust features, Helium empowers businesses of all sizes to efficiently track, monitor, and optimize their workforce's time.
